# eui-menu-panel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute     | Description                                                                            | Type                             | Default     |
| ------------------------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `headerless`             | `headerless`  | Makes the panel headerless                                                             | `boolean`                        | `false`     |
| `panelName` _(required)_ | `panel-name`  | sets the name of the menu panel                                                        | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `panelTitle`             | `panel-title` | sets the title of the panel                                                            | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `size`                   | `size`        | sets the size of the component can be 'small', 'medium' or 'large' defaults to 'small' | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'small'`   |
